location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Rough Sketch Map Showing Approximate Area of Morrah Tribal 'Dira' From Baduin Sources'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on blueprint paper.Dimensions: 385mm x 330mm.

mods.abstract: The map shows 'Al Morrah' and other tribal areas and a few physical features in the south-eastern part of the Arabian Peninsula. A 'dira' is a tribal area. The word Baduin in the title is equivalent to Bedouin.
